data.name: 1 Year Fixed Home Loan Investment Interest Only
data.description: Our fixed rate home loans provide security of fixed repayments and allows for additional repayments up to $10,000 per annum.

bundles.name: Home Bundle
bundles.description: Get a bonus 15% off your Home and Contents Insurance for the life of your home loan.

fees.name: Document Preparation and Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable once only per standard loan facility and includes the cost of: •Document generation• Distribution of documents• Verification of returned documents• Verification of search requirements• Settlement booking• Settlement attendance(PEXA or paper)• Lodgement of title documents

fees.name: Interest Rate Lock Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at the time of application if you elect to lock-in your interest rate for a period of 90 days from the date you apply for your loan. The greater of $500 or 0.15% of the value of the loan is payable.

fees.name: Additional valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost

fees.name: Loan Document Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to generate or change loan documents only.

fees.name: Non-Proceeding Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you no longer wish to proceed with your loan application with RACQ once it's been documented. The full fee is payable if certified.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if surplus settlement funds are required to be transferred same day by telegraphic transfer

fees.name: Deed of Priority Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a deed of priority is required.

fees.name: Change of Name Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to prepare the change of name documents for lodgement at the lands title office.

fees.name: Non-Proceeding Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a discharge does not proceed

fees.name: Discharge incidental to substitution or internal refinance fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for a discharge that is incidental to a substitution or internal refinance

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for standard partial or full discharges. $82.50 is payable for additional properties.

fees.name: Fix / Refixing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to fix or refix an established loan

fees.name: Mortgage Top Up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for further advance. Valuation fees are payable at cost.

fees.name: Loan Splitting Fee - for existing home loans
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to split existing home loans

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each bank cheque required for settlement

fees.name: Guarantee Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a Guarantee is required to secure a loan facility.

fees.name: Dealing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in addition to when otherwise specified in the Loan Fees Schedule, if we give or withhold consent to a document that affects our security.

fees.name: Substitution of Mortgage Security (single property) Fee - for new loans
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for substitution of a mortgage security

fees.name: Settlement Re-Attendance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when settlement needs to be re-attended

fees.name: Settlement Cancellation and Rebooking Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when settlement is cancelled and needs to be re-booked

fees.name: Early Termination Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you repay your loan or change to a variable interest rate during the fixed rate period. Applicable to fixed term loans only. Interest differential as defined in the loan contract + $200 administration fee is payable.

fees.name: Default Administration Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Payable (at our discretion) if an event of default occurs

fees.name: Company / Trust - Borrower / Guarantor Party Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each company or trust borrower / guarantor party on the loan.

fees.name: Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in addition to when otherwise specified in the Loan Fees Schedule, if we vary or renegotiate the terms of your loan contract at your request

fees.name: Loan Splitting Fee - for new home loans
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to split new home loans

fees.name: Early Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you make extra repayments that exceed $10,000 per annum during any fixed period. Applicable to fixed term loans only. Interest differential as defined in the loan contract is payable.

fees.name: Out of CBD Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when settlement takes place outside of Brisbane CBD

fees.name: Courier Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost if a courier is required for loan documents

fees.name: Urgency Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a loan needs to be documented and settled urgently.

fees.name: Variation Loan Document Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for loan top ups to generate and change loan documents

fees.name: Urgent or Complex Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for urgent or complex discharges

fees.name: Substitution of Mortgage Security (single property) Fee - for variations
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for substitution of a mortgage security

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee includes the cost of: preparation of one mortgage, valuations up to $220. Any amount above this is payable.

fees.name: Additional Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each additional loan against an existing security. Valuation fees are payable at cost.

fees.name: Trust Deed Review Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for reviewing trust deeds

fees.name: Mortgage Priority Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a mortgage priority is required.

fees.name: Consents and Production of Title Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for consents and production of title

fees.name: Title Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost for each security being taken and typically two title searches are performed.

fees.name: Default Enforcement Expenses
fees.additionalInfo: May apply if enforcement services are required as part of default administration

fees.name: Additional Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each additional security within a loan facility

fees.name: Company Search and Review Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for doing a company search and review

fees.name: Cancellation of and Re-Issuing Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when bank cheques are required to be cancelled and re-issued.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest only term is available for up to 5 years

lendingRates.additionalValue: Available for new RACQ Bank home loans with an eligible LVR between >70% to <=80% only.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest only term is available for up to 5 years

lendingRates.additionalValue: Available for new RACQ Bank home loans with an eligible LVR of <=70% only.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest only term is available for up to 5 years
